item.title: 追求无宿醉的狂欢
item.description: 初创公司 GABA Labs 正在测试一种添加剂，该公司称这种添加剂将使无酒精饮料更上一层楼。【原文：Startup GABA Labs is testing an additive that it says will take nonalcoholic drinks to the next level.】

item.title: 欧洲可可生产放缓凸显全球巧克力业困境
item.description: 欧洲可可工厂的生产放缓正在加深，这凸显了历史性的高价格是如何抑制需求并损害这个巧克力第一大消费地区加工商的利润的。【原文：The slowdown at Europe’s cocoa factories is deepening, highlighting how historically high prices are curbing demand and hurting processors’ profits in the top chocolate consuming region.】

item.title: Trafigura 数年来首次重返债券市场
item.description: 全球最大的大宗商品供应商之一 Trafigura 集团重返债券市场，发行了 5 亿美元的债券，这是其数年来首次公开发行债券。【原文：Trafigura Group, one of the world’s largest suppliers of commodities, has returned to the bond market with a $500 million issuance, its first public debt offering in several years.】

item.title: 分析师称印尼降息和贸易协议将支持经济增长
item.description: 据分析师称，随着印尼宣布与美国达成贸易协议，印尼央行下调政策利率将刺激印尼经济增长，而未来的货币宽松政策将取决于印尼盾的稳定性。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s policy rate cut will spur the nation’s economic growth as it announces a trade deal with the US, with future monetary easing depending on rupiah’s stability, according to analysts.】

item.title: 普拉博沃确认美国将对印尼商品征收 19% 的关税
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统证实，在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普直接谈判后，他与美国达成了一项关税协议。【原文：Indonesia’s president confirmed he struck a tariff deal with the US after direct negotiations with President Donald Trump accelerated months of talks between officials of both countries.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会（IATA）会长表示，在飞机失事调查中使用摄像头的理由十分充分
item.description: 国际航空运输协会（International Air Transport Association）负责人表示，安装驾驶舱摄像头将大大有助于航空安全当局调查像最近印度航空公司致命空难这样的事故。【原文：The installation of cockpit cameras would greatly help aviation safety authorities investigating accidents like the recent fatal Air India crash, according to the head of the International Air Transport Association.】

item.title: 软银支持的旅游应用 Klook 据称考虑在美国上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，旅游休闲预订平台 Klook 正在探索在美国进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达 5 亿美元。【原文：Klook, a travel and leisure booking platform, is exploring an initial public offering in the US that may raise as much as $500 million, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: ASML 称放宽中国人工智能芯片管制将促进需求增长
item.description: ASML Holding NV 首席财务官罗杰-达森（Roger Dassen）表示，如果华盛顿解除对中国销售部分人工智能处理器的限制，将对芯片需求产生积极影响。【原文：ASML Holding NV Chief Financial Officer Roger Dassen said it will be positive for chip demand if Washington lifts restrictions on the sale of some artificial intelligence processors to China.】

item.title: 泰国寻求遏制金价对货币影响的方法
item.description: 泰国央行副行长表示，泰国央行和财政部正在讨论如何解决货币走势与基本面因素不符的问题，包括黄金价格的影响。【原文：Thailand’s central bank and the finance ministry are discussing ways to address currency moves that are not aligned with fundamental factors, including the impact of gold prices, according to a deputy governor.】

item.title: 曾被视为惩罚性关税的特朗普关税如今赢得市场认可
item.description: 周三，金融市场对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与印尼达成的关税协议反应平淡，这表明曾被视为惩罚性的 20% 左右的税率现在被认为是可行的。【原文：Financial markets greeted US President Donald Trump’s tariff deal with Indonesia with little fanfare Wednesday, signaling the rate of around 20% that was once viewed as punitive is now seen as workable.】

item.title: 特朗普设置 19% 关税，印尼降息支持经济增长
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对来自东南亚最大经济体的商品征收 19% 的关税后，印度尼西亚银行下调了基准利率以支撑经济增长。【原文：Bank Indonesia cut its benchmark interest rate to shore up growth after US President Donald Trump announced a 19% tariff on goods from Southeast Asia’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 据说美银亚洲工业银行家郑宇明将离开美银
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国银行亚太区投资银行部董事总经理汤米-郑（Tommy Zheng）已经离职。【原文：Tommy Zheng, a managing director at Bank of America Corp.’s investment banking division in Asia Pacific, has left the firm, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 成本上升，美国和加拿大企业加强外汇套期保值
item.description: 受今年货币波动影响的北美企业正在对冲更多的汇率风险，即使这种保护的成本在飙升。【原文：North American firms battered by this year’s currency swings are hedging more of their exposure to exchange rates, even as the cost of that protection surges.】

item.title: ASML 和雷诺业绩黯淡，欧洲股市连续第四天下跌
item.description: 由于一系列令人失望的财报，包括 ASML Holding NV 和 Renault SA 的财报，欧洲股市连续第四天下跌。【原文：European stocks fell for a fourth straight day on a slate of disappointing earnings reports, including from ASML Holding NV and Renault SA.】

item.title: 南非顶级航空公司因工资僵局面临飞行员罢工
item.description: 南非最大的航空公司 FlySafair 的工会 Solidarity 表示，由于未能就工资问题达成协议，该公司一半以上的飞行员正准备罢工。【原文：More than half of the pilots at South Africa’s largest airline FlySafair are preparing to go on strike after failing to reach and an agreement on wages, labor union Solidarity said.】

item.title: SMBC 向阿波罗出售逾 15 亿美元投资级贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. has sold a portfolio of over $1.5 billion performing loans in Asia Pacific to Apollo Global Management, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特王朝家族办公室重聘 2024 年离职的高管
item.description: 中东最大企业集团之一背后王朝的一家投资公司重新聘用了一位长期高管，而这位高管离职后不到 18 个月就为另一个超级富豪家族管理资金。【原文：An investment firm for the dynasty behind one of the Middle East’s biggest conglomerates has rehired a longtime executive less than 18 months after he exited to manage money for another super-rich family.】

item.title: 洛克控制的阿克尔公司计划在北极圈上方建造人工智能工厂
item.description: 挪威亿万富翁谢尔-英格-洛克（Kjell Inge Rokke）控制的能源集团阿克尔公司（Aker ASA）计划在北极城市纳尔维克（Narvik）建立一个以人工智能能力为目标的设施。【原文：Aker ASA, the energy conglomerate controlled by Norwegian billionaire Kjell Inge Rokke, plans to set up a facility targeting artificial intelligence capabilities in the Arctic city of Narvik.】

item.title: 土耳其热门市长在最新审判中面临政治禁令
item.description: 土耳其最受欢迎的反对派政治家、伊斯坦布尔市长埃克雷姆-伊马莫格卢（Ekrem Imamoglu）将于周三出庭受审，这起案件可能会终结他的职业生涯。【原文：Turkey’s most popular opposition politician, Istanbul Mayor Ekrem Imamoglu, is set to appear in court on Wednesday in a case that could end his career.】

item.title: 日本超长期债券在大选前的波动中反弹
item.description: 由于担心本周末举行的上议院选举将导致政府支出增加，日本超长期债券周三上涨，扭转了本周早些时候的颓势。【原文：Japan’s super-long bonds rose on Wednesday, reversing course after a rout earlier in the week over concern that an upper house election this weekend will result in higher government spending.】

item.title: 法国总统隆巴在反对党会谈中表示将 "改进 "预算案
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴（Eric Lombard）表示，他相信政府能够让 2026 年预算获得议会批准，并愿意通过与反对党讨论来改进该计划。【原文：French Finance Minister Eric Lombard said he’s confident the government will be able to get the 2026 budget approved in parliament and is open to improving the plan through discussions with opposition parties.】

item.title: 泰国央行竞选人强调与政府合作的必要性
item.description: 泰国央行下一任行长的竞争者表示，她在阐述利率路径时会 "更积极一些"，并呼吁更紧密地协调货币和财政政策。【原文：A contender to be Bank of Thailand’s next governor said she’d be “a little more aggressive” in articulating the path for interest rates, calling for closer coordination of monetary and fiscal policies.】

item.title: 英国通胀率意外跃升至 2024 年初以来最高点
item.description: 英国通胀率意外升至 2024 年 1 月以来的最高水平，原因是工党政府的预算案推高了食品支出，使英国央行在寻求降低利率时继续承受压力。【原文：UK inflation unexpectedly rose to its highest level since January 2024 as the Labour government’s budget pushed up grocery bills, keeping pressure on the Bank of England as it looks to dial down interest rates.】

item.title: 花旗集团支持白银飙升，黄金反弹势头减弱
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）重申了对黄金更为谨慎的立场。【原文：Silver will extend a rally beyond $40 an ounce in the coming months on tightening physical supplies and growing investment demand, according to Citigroup Inc., which reiterated a more cautious stance on gold.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 6 月通胀率升幅超预期
无人机在伊拉克北部袭击 DNO 油田
item.description: 本周三，DNO ASA 在伊拉克北部运营的两个油田遭到无人机袭击，这是本周该地区能源设施遭受的第三次此类袭击。【原文：Two oil fields operated by DNO ASA in northern Iraq were attacked by drones on Wednesday, a third such hit on energy installations in the region this week.】

item.title: 塞内加尔发行非洲法郎政府债券募集 6.44 亿美元资金
item.description: 塞内加尔财政部表示，塞内加尔在地区市场上出售政府债券，筹集了 3,640 亿非洲法郎（6.44 亿美元）。【原文：Senegal raised 364 billion CFA francs ($644 million) in a government bond sale in the regional market, the finance ministry said.】

item.title: 据说华平投资新加坡交易员李将离开 PE 公司
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，华平投资公司的交易员特伦斯-李（Terence Lee）即将离开这家美国私募股权公司。【原文：Warburg Pincus dealmaker Terence Lee is leaving the US private equity firm, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 人工智能支出推动需求增长，ASML订单超出预期
item.description: 在人工智能热潮推动了对其精密芯片制造设备的需求之后，ASML Holding NV 公司第二季度的订单超过了预期，尽管公司首席执行官克里斯托夫-福凯（Christophe Fouquet）对 2026 年持谨慎态度。【原文：ASML Holding NV’s orders in the second quarter beat estimates after the artificial intelligence boom drove demand for its sophisticated chip-making machines, even as Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet struck a cautious note for 2026.】

item.title: 英伟达老板预计将很快获得首批 H20 中国出口许可证
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）老板黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）预计将很快获得美国首批向中国出口H20人工智能芯片的许可证，从而正式允许该公司恢复在世界顶级半导体领域销售备受追捧的元件。【原文：Nvidia Corp. boss Jensen Huang anticipates getting the first batch of US licenses to export H20 AI chips to China soon, formally allowing the company to resume sales of a much sought-after component in the world’s top semiconductor arena.】
